message: Reminder: You are registered for Ask Our Experts: SEO Basics To Start Your Year Off Right on Wednesday, January 31, 2024 at 2 p.m. ET/11 a.m. PT.
You can use this link to join us.
If you have any questions you would like to submit to our experts ahead of time, please click here.
If you have trouble, please contact Justia Support for assistance.

Have you ever wanted to sit down with a Search Engine Optimization (SEO) expert and ask them your burning questions about how to get your website ranking better on Google? Or how to get better, more valuable leads through search? Well, now you can!

You’re invited to join members of our Justia SEO Team, Ana Hidalgo, Gustavo Montes, and CEO Tim Stanley, as they answer all your questions about SEO to kick off 2024. Ask Our Experts: SEO Basics To Start Your Year Off Right begins promptly at 2 p.m. ET/11 a.m. PT on Wednesday, January 31, 2024.
bottomline: Seats are limited, so reserve yours today!

message: Does trying to learn about Search Engine Optimization (SEO) feel impossible? Have no fear, our experts are here to help! Come and ask our team your questions to get the answers you've been waiting for.

You’re invited to join members of our Justia SEO Team, Ana Hidalgo, Gustavo Montes, and CEO Tim Stanley as they answer all your questions about SEO to kick off 2024. Ask Our Experts: SEO Basics To Start Your Year Off Right. begins promptly at 2 p.m. ET/11 a.m. PT on Wednesday, January 31, 2024.

Hi Name,

Thank you for joining us for our recent Justia Webinars presentation! You must complete your attendance verification to receive CLE credit. As a reminder, if you have a free Justia Connect membership, you must upgrade to Justia Connect Pro to receive CLE credit.
The steps below must be completed by 11:00 a.m. PT on Saturday, January 6, 2024 to receive credit.
Completing Your Attendance Verification
number-list: Input the attendance verification code received during your presentation.
Follow the remaining prompts in the form to input all pertinent information and offer evaluation of the MCLE presentation.
Download your certificate, and you’re done!
message2: If you have any questions about verification, please contact Justia Support.

message: Thank you for joining us for our recent Justia Webinars presentation, Ask Our Experts: SEO Basics To Start Your Year Off Right. We love connecting our members with new learning opportunities and hope you found the webinar both engaging and informative.
As we continue to plan future Justia Webinars for Justia Connect members, we want to hear from you! If you have not already done so, please share your feedback about your recent webinar experience.
